page.title: 14THE EURO M.P.
page.content: Mr.Megahy is a Euro M.P for the{West {Yorkshire Constituency.}In 1979 he lost a local election, he stood for election as the Euro M.P. Mr.Megahy has meetings in{Brussels, {Strasbourg and Luxembourg.}He drives to{Manchester,}then it takes 1 hour from{Manchester to Brussels}by plane. From{Manchester to Strasbourg}it takes 6 hours by plane and 2 hours down the German moterway.The plane fares are paid by the E.E.C. When he attends meetings they discuss very conplicated things such as Agriclture, Food prices, Atomic energy, Coal and unemployment. They discuss things such as helping the poorer parts of Europe, and helping get food to parts of Africa. M.P's at the moment are discussing soccer violence and what they can do about it.They are appalled at the violence
